product_name: The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants prepare boys for family hikes or long days at camp with durable, sun-protective stretch nylon fabric and zip-off legs that quickly morph them into shorts. UPF 50+ sun protection. Internal adjustable elasticized waistband with zippered fly and belt loops; slash hand pockets; rear patch pocket. The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants feature EZ Grow cuffs that allow you to extend the length of these pants as your child grows.
short_description: The North Face Camp Hike Convertible Pants prepare boys for family hikes or long days at camp with durable, sun-protective stretch nylon fabric and zip-off legs that quickly morph them into shorts.
